      • removeFileNameSuffix

        public static java.lang.String removeFileNameSuffix(java.lang.String fileName)
        Removes the suffix from the passed file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - File name to remove suffix from.
        Returns:
        fileName without a suffix.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if null file name passed.

      • getFileNameSuffix

        public static java.lang.String getFileNameSuffix(java.lang.String fileName)

      • changeFileNameToClassName

        public static java.lang.String changeFileNameToClassName(java.lang.String name)
        Change the passed file name to its corresponding class name. E.G. change "Utilities.class" to "Utilities".
        Parameters:
        name - Class name to be changed. If this does not represent a Java class then null is returned.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a null name passed.

      • getClosingParenthesisPos

        public static int getClosingParenthesisPos(java.lang.String source,
                                           int openningPos)
                                    throws java.text.ParseException
        Returns the position of closing parenthesis at openningPos. If char at openningPos is not an openning parenthesis, it is ignored. If source expression contains nested '(...)' blocks, they are ignored. If closing parenthesis can not be found (unbalanced parenthesis), an ParseException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        source - The expression to search in
        openningPos - The position where the '(' should be
        Returns:
        The position where the closing ')' is
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • toAscii

        public static java.lang.String toAscii(java.lang.String str,
                                       java.lang.String unconvertibleCharReplacement)
        Convertit une chaîne de caratères Unicode (Java) en ASCII. Permet notamment de retirer les accents. Seule certains caractères de la plage Latin-1 sont convertis (caractères accentués, gillemets, etc.). Si un caratère de la chaîne d'entrée n'est pas exprimable en ASCII, il est remplacé par unconvertibleCharReplacement.
        Parameters:
        str -
        unconvertibleCharReplacement -
        Returns:
